DOC.brief_summary: Optic atrophy type 1 ( OPA1 ) nuclear dynamin-related GTPase , target inner mitochondrial membrane , play role mitochondrial fusion . Mitochondria fusion associate process apoptosis . . OPA1 play important role mitochondrial bioenergetics mitochondrial network . The change mitochondrial shape mitochondrial bioenergetics may cause disease . In study , investigate expression OPA1 lung adenocarcinoma ( LADC ) cell tissue .
